headline: Appeals Court Judge John Eklund joins Extended Housing board
author: Editorial Staff
sentences: The organization said that Eklund brings a strong history of leadership to the board having served on the boards of the Geauga YMCA, Western Reserve Land Conservancy, and United Way Services of Geauga County, and his current service with Lake-Geauga Habitat for Humanity.
Extended Housing recently announced Appeals Court Judge John Eklund has joined its board of directors.
